input_str:
Madeon’s Adventure is a versatile compilation of tracks across the dance, indie rock and pop genres. Quality vocal features (including that of his own) combine with polished and complex production to create a blissful musical journey from start to finish.

Adventure, the debut album for French Wunderkind Madeon, takes listeners on a colourful and whimsical musical journey. It represents three years of hard work on the producer’s part, and it certainly shows. Every single note and vocal is crafted to orchestrate a soundtrack
